snippet: The head of America’s Cup challenger Emirates Team New Zealand accused defending champion Oracle Team USA of cheating in the latest controversy in sailing’s premier regatta.
abstract: Head of America’s Cup challenger Emirates Team New Zealand accuses defending champion Oracle Team USA of cheating in the latest controversy in sailing’s premier regatta.
lead_paragraph: The head of America’s Cup challenger Emirates Team New Zealand accused defending champion Oracle Team USA of cheating in the latest controversy in sailing’s premier regatta.

headline.main: Accusation of Cheating in America’s Cup
